name: Deep Cave Heart
description:
Game was made for mini-jam-109 in 3 days!

Controls:

W/A/S/D - movement

Click on the character - Get a heart

Move a heart by dragging it with mouse cursor

1/2/3 - To recall a particular heart back to you

I feel tired. I need to sleep.

F.A.Q

Q: Why player has 3 hearts?

A: Because.

Q: Are big hearts any different from small hearts?

A: Yeah.

Q: In what way?

A: Big hearts don't do anything.

Q: The main character collects the fourth heart at the end of the game, when did they collect the other 3?

A: I don't know, ask them.

Q: I don't understand the ending

A: Yeah. It's quite DEEP. (haha, do you get it?)
